comments: Great game. Everything you could want in a game. Castle building, PvP. Unique equipment with special stats. Different attack types, economy classes. Rewards are rewarding enough. So far 5/5. The theme is good. The balance seems reasonable. My only suggestion is making to character limit for name changes bigger for the dwellers/subjects. Only thing I can constructively suggest. Or be able to type first and last name.

Love the concept of the game but the moment you start reaching higher castle lvl  that's when you realize that if you don't pay you will be on a long journey, ie.. PvP are out of the question everyone has minimum of 5 epic items, arena you will have to settle for 5th or less place due to power lvl difference. I am about 141000 fighting 190000 or 90000, which is not fair for those of low power or advantage to those of high.

After playing for a few hours this I find this game good my only problem is that you need to pay for those epic drops? I mean in a game if you defeated the boss those are supposed to be yours without paying, I can accept paying for 1 dollar but the second boss requires me to purchase it for almost $3 I already paid for premium I don't want to pay for other things. Please make the drops free for premium members or have them cheap or totally free, or else after my premium I'll quit this game.

I loved this game very much, I had a lot of really nice things and invested nearly $60 dollars into making my guys 5 stars and diamonds and other level up promos... I was the clan leader of the "Bananna Kings" my main complaint is my phone rebooted and now I've lost everything... my game, my victories, my clan, and all the money I invested in this great game... please help. ;( my username on my good account is "Skylark"

Loved playing the game, I just wish there was a balance in the PvP Tournaments, can't find a tournament where everyone else isn't 20000 Points over my guys. Please fix this!! Just put a bloody +/-5000 points deviation on it! Make it more enjoyable for people who don't buy everything they see

best game on mobile i think. just make sure your account is linked to your facebook and google play so you dont ever lose your account i almost lost everything when my phone broke. luckly i got it to turn on for a bit before going off and linked my accounts. now im fine..
description: Become the lord and master of a real medieval castle! Accept new subjects, assign them to their duties, train and protect your men and women! Defy your rivals and laws of physics as you build and upgrade your fortress! Your pudgy warriors look great in their shining armor! Nourish and train your troops, and they’ll crush the armies of Grav the Mighty Brainpan, find the shelter of the fearsome OM-NOM, put the Abyss Lord back in his place, and also burn down a couple of enemies’ castles! All day long your scribes scratch their heads with quills, treasurers spill coins on the floor and blacksmiths drop anvils on their feet for the sake of your prosperity! Prepare true specialists, become wealthy and influential! Build a dating room and watch your subjects have children who’ll soon grow up and serve you too! Assume command, my lord! Here are some of the opportunities you get in the game: - Story-driven campaign. In hundreds of missions your heroes fight orcs, giants, skeletons and even dragons! Battle magic, cold steel and cunning strategy – the end justifies the means! - Castle construction. Build new rooms for your stronghold and upgrade the existing ones. You’ve got all you need to create a dream castle! Begin the construction now! - Developing the villagers. Each of your subjects can learn new skills and wear any equipment. Train great warriors and scribes… and then swap them with each other! - Multiplayer. Get medieval! Burn and plunder the castle of someone you don’t like… And you don’t like all of them, right?We are now working on:- Clans: Join an exciting cooperative gameplay! Create clans together with other players, talk in chat, develop you kingdoms, train your champions, conquer territories and dominate other kingdoms.- Portals and mazes: even more options to earn unique chests with precious rewards. New enemies, new bosses and new territories!- Caravans: if you are tired of war, go into business!- The extension of the storyline campaign: get to the chief villain and triumph over the universal evil!- Collections and unique heroes- Daily log-in bonuses- The improvement of the visual elements of the game- The optimization and balance of the game process- Performance improvementsAll of these and many other innovations are waiting for you in the upcoming updates!
descriptionHTML:
Become the lord and master of a real medieval castle! Accept new subjects, assign them to their duties, train and protect your men and women! Defy your rivals and laws of physics as you build and upgrade your fortress!

Your pudgy warriors look great in their shining armor! Nourish and train your troops, and they’ll crush the armies of Grav the Mighty Brainpan, find the shelter of the fearsome OM-NOM, put the Abyss Lord back in his place, and also burn down a couple of enemies’ castles!

All day long your scribes scratch their heads with quills, treasurers spill coins on the floor and blacksmiths drop anvils on their feet for the sake of your prosperity! Prepare true specialists, become wealthy and influential! Build a dating room and watch your subjects have children who’ll soon grow up and serve you too!


Assume command, my lord! Here are some of the opportunities you get in the game:

- Story-driven campaign. In hundreds of missions your heroes fight orcs, giants, skeletons and even dragons! Battle magic, cold steel and cunning strategy – the end justifies the means!
- Castle construction. Build new rooms for your stronghold and upgrade the existing ones. You’ve got all you need to create a dream castle! Begin the construction now!
- Developing the villagers. Each of your subjects can learn new skills and wear any equipment. Train great warriors and scribes… and then swap them with each other!
- Multiplayer. Get medieval! Burn and plunder the castle of someone you don’t like… And you don’t like all of them, right?

We are now working on:

- Performance improvements
All of these and many other innovations are waiting for you in the upcoming updates!

description: Celebrate Spring with our limited-time Spring updatesBuild your own world in this strategy war game! War and Order is the perfect fusion of real time strategy, tower defense, and castle building games and has received several Global Google Recommendations. Orcs, elves, and mages are yours to command in a gorgeous 3D medieval game world. Raise a massive fantasy army for HUGE fully animated battles. Clash with enemies from all over the world in real-time! Choose your alliance and take castles, slay monsters, and stake new territory as a tribe! This is WAR, and there’s never a dull moment as your screen lights up with constant new battles, chats, and upgrades!You must battle to become more powerful than any king in history in this dangerous war game. It’s up to you, your strategy, and your allies to conquer an endless world of empires and imagination.★HOMELAND• Recruit and train over 50 fantasy soldiers, uniting Orcs, Elves, Humans, Mages, Beasts, and Angels.• Your ultimate building game: Construct and upgrade tons of buildings for new soldiers, buffs, and resources!• Research new magic and technology FAST for cutting-edge tactics and weapons!★ALLIANCE• Friend, feud, and chat with players from around the world in real time. • Fight and build together to conquer enemies and build castles you could never hold alone.• Share and expand territory for exclusive bonuses! • But remember! This is a war strategy game. Tust no one!★CONFRONTATION• Sweep the battlefield in huge real-time PvP matches!• Build your force to leviathan proportions!• Engulf other lords’ castles as you expand your territory.★CONQUEST• Command and conquer other players’ castles to plunder their resources and climb power rankings!• Vanquish roaming monsters for their treasures, from man-eating Ogres to massive Dragons.• Play castle defense games and protect yourself and your allies from would-be conquerors.★EMPIRE• Not just a one castle game: Take over the Royal City to rule over the realm with unheard of power and privileges! • Explore unknown lands to find elite resources, ancient ruins, and more surprises!• Grow your alliance territory for richer rewards and resources!Follow War and Order on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarandOrder1/

comments: I like the game its fun and engaging but the premium choices cost a lot of diamonds and you don't get a lot opportunity to earn them. 12- 18 diamonds for more then a couple  choices in a story to make interesting choices that wouldmake the storys better but you only earn 1 diamond a chapter witch you have to wait an hour or more to unlock or buy keys.  So you pretty much have to spend real money for this game to really enjoy it. Ill be deleting this app not worth my time.

While the game is enjoyable and the stories are intriguing, it is way too expensive to make certain choices. There is absolutely no need for choices to cost 20 or 25 diamonds when you only get 1 diamond for each chapter completed.  This game is in no way good enough to warrant spending real money on it, especially considering the ridiculously high prices of making certain choices which would require making a purchase in every single chapter.

The game is great. Great graphics, nice music, perfectly cued entrees  for new characters, amazing story line.... But they don't give you enough keys or diamonds. I mean, y s its understandable that the chapters are long but 2hrs for a recharge on keys? Really? Either make the waiting time shorter, give us more, or both. Now as for the diamonds, they give you 25 of them. But each special choices is always way to much. And you never really know when your going to need them for something serious. With that said either give us more keys, lower the cost of the choice, or give us more diamonds per chapter. Not like 2 but 5 or more.

It's a brilliant app, though sometimes I wish there wasn't as many gem choices. I fully considered buying gems until I realised how quickly they'd be used.   My favourite story was It Lives In The Woods, though most of the choices are gem choices. The story itself is fantastic, and I love the diversity of characters.   I had a problem with a story playing up and after a chat with the team was told to restart it. I didn't mind but I didn't get any keys to compensate what I'd already spent (I don't buy them I just wait for then to recharge, but it did mean I had to respend keys on one story because of a issue out of my control)   Overall its a great app and highly playable without spending.

Diamond choices come up way too often for how much they cost and how little you get. The keys have an unreasonably long cooldown to get them. Options like watching ads to get diamonds would be a great option, especially seeings how you have that option in HSS and HU:RS. All that aside its a good game. Lots of the stories are enjoyable and its visually pleasing.

Great graphics and great stories. Right now they have like 30 "books", so there are lots of options. I've been playing since 2016 and the app just keeps getting better. Can get a little pricey for the preminum choices, but otherwise it's a fantastic app; very additive and entertaining
description: One choice can change everything! Fall in love, solve crimes, and embark on epic fantasy adventures in immersive visual stories where YOU control what happens next! Current stories include:THE FRESHMAN, BOOK 1. Welcome to Hartfeld University! You'll make friends for life, and maybe even find true love. Will you date bookish James, party girl Kaitlyn, football hero Chris... or all three at once?- Dress to impress with fashion forward outfits.- Choose a date for the elegant and romantic Winter Formal.- Support new friends as you tackle freshman adventures together!THE CROWN & THE FLAME, BOOK 1. Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown!- Form alliances to build your army.- Master unique weapons.- Choose between elegant ball gowns and powerful armor.- Crush your enemies in an epic battle!MOST WANTED, BOOK 1. The heat is on when a no-nonsense Texas Marshal and a Hollywood detective are thrown together to stop a deranged hitman. Can you catch the killer?- Play as Detective Dave Reyes and U.S. Marshal Sam Massey.- Investigate a mystery with twists you won't see coming.- Examine evidence at crime scenes.- Stop the killer before he can claim another victim!...PLUS more new stories COMING SOON!Choices is by the team that first created story games for mobile over a decade ago. Later we created Surviving High School and Cause of Death, the first games with episodes, for EA.Both games hit the Top 25 and were inspirations for other companies. After leaving EA, our team regrouped in a small office and with the quacking of nearby ducklings we set out to create story driven games with heart. As Pixelberry, we launched two hit games, High School Story and Hollywood U.Our team has now grown to over a dozen of the most experienced game writers in the industry. In our 10 years of creating story games together, we’ve seen heartbreak, marriages, great adventures, and even Pixelbabies.But even through diaper changes and late nights, we think we’ve created our best work to date. We hope you’ll fall in love with our newest characters, Chris, James, Kaitlyn, Dave, and Sam just as we have.Enjoy,- The Pixelberry Team
descriptionHTML:
One choice can change everything! Fall in love, solve crimes, and embark on epic fantasy adventures in immersive visual stories where YOU control what happens next! Current stories include:


THE FRESHMAN, BOOK 1. Welcome to Hartfeld University! You'll make friends for life, and maybe even find true love. Will you date bookish James, party girl Kaitlyn, football hero Chris... or all three at once?

- Dress to impress with fashion forward outfits.
- Choose a date for the elegant and romantic Winter Formal.
- Support new friends as you tackle freshman adventures together!

THE CROWN & THE FLAME, BOOK 1. Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown!

- Form alliances to build your army.
- Master unique weapons.
- Choose between elegant ball gowns and powerful armor.
- Crush your enemies in an epic battle!

MOST WANTED, BOOK 1. The heat is on when a no-nonsense Texas Marshal and a Hollywood detective are thrown together to stop a deranged hitman. Can you catch the killer?

- Play as Detective Dave Reyes and U.S. Marshal Sam Massey.
- Investigate a mystery with twists you won't see coming.
- Examine evidence at crime scenes.
- Stop the killer before he can claim another victim!

...PLUS more new stories COMING SOON!

Choices is by the team that first created story games for mobile over a decade ago. Later we created Surviving High School and Cause of Death, the first games with episodes, for EA.

Both games hit the Top 25 and were inspirations for other companies. After leaving EA, our team regrouped in a small office and with the quacking of nearby ducklings we set out to create story driven games with heart. As Pixelberry, we launched two hit games, High School Story and Hollywood U.

Our team has now grown to over a dozen of the most experienced game writers in the industry. In our 10 years of creating story games together, we’ve seen heartbreak, marriages, great adventures, and even Pixelbabies.

But even through diaper changes and late nights, we think we’ve created our best work to date. We hope you’ll fall in love with our newest characters, Chris, James, Kaitlyn, Dave, and Sam just as we have.

Enjoy,

- The Pixelberry Team

comments: Repetitive game that requires a lot of thinking. Quite addictive as I've been playing for nearly year and half now. I didn't spend a penny on game but quite a lot of time. Its very difficult to be very good without spending real cash but it's possible. You can watch adverts for coins, so be patient and play. The more you play the more you get. You don't need top characters to have great team - you can create great team with average characters if you focus on weapons. Get yourself into a good team, hit faction's minimums and you'll become great.

There are good and bad aspects of this game, but the pros out weigh the cons. You can absolutely level up incredibly high without spending a single penny on this game. You just need patience. One of the funniest aspects of this game is its long term playability. There is always something to do every day and in the long run it all adds up to your benefit.  My only complaint is the pop up windows when you first get on. They show you you've been raided...then you have the notification that you have to check that gives you the same info. If the pop up already gives me the info, why do I still have notifications?

Rubbish repetitive game. After spending ten's of thousands pointlessly I can tell you honestly... don't waste your time or money. It's a very addictive cash cow and just a very smart way to take your money and keep you hooked. Scopely has repeatedly lied and will continue to do so. You have been warned

Ive been playing this for 2 years, love it but support is well below standard. I have a problem just now where it crashes every 5 mins and support do nothing. Its become unplayable. Avoid if you have a samsung device

The game has slowly been turning more p2w than ever before. Before 6 stars had come into play, you could easily get any 5 stars. Even some p2w toons were able to be accessed later on in some events. With 6 stars, this really isn't the case. This has also caused the Road to Survival community to become more toxic and started making the game unfair/not fun for other players.

I like the strategy involved in playing the game. The only thing I think I would change is when you kill an enemy and he comes back to life,  they should come back as a zombie. .not keep all their ability before death. .otherwise it keeps you interested.
description: The Walking Dead Road to Survival is the definitive Walking Dead strategy RPG game, brought to you by Robert Kirkman, creator of The Walking Dead comic series.Build your team of Survivors and develop battle strategies to lead them into battle in an uncompromising story, fraught with danger. Fight for survival against walkers and humans alike, using strategy to attack enemy weak points and deep RPG progression to decide your path. Build a town to keep the walkers at bay, but be warned – The horrors that lurk outside aren’t the only threat, and your decisions are all that stand between life and death.Based on an all-new story from award-winning Walking Dead writer Jay Bonansinga, the dark aesthetic of this game reflects the uncompromising decisions you will need to make as you strategize for survival.Stand with Michonne, Rick and other survivors from The Walking Dead, and join the epic battle against the darkest enemies from the Governor to Negan.THE WALKING DEAD: ROAD TO SURVIVAL FEATURES:Fight Walkers & Survivors• Battle against fierce opponents and use your best strategy to survive• Headshot! Land critical hits and deal crippling blows to your enemies• Charge opponents with special melee and ranged attacks using deadly weapons like Michonne’s katanaCollect & Recruit Survivors• Collect new Survivors from The Walking Dead universe, each with their own specialized battle strategyUpgrade Your Survivors • Level up and customize Survivors to enhance their fighting strategies, weapons and skills• RPG progression makes your Survivors stronger as they cut down more walkersStrategy Gameplay - Capitalize on Strengths & Exploit Weaknesses• Battle strategy is key to scoring powerful hits – but watch out for retaliating strikes• Your battle strategy is all that’s keeping the Survivors of Woodbury safe – Strategize and strike to winMaps & Locations From The Walking Dead• Explore a new 3D map featuring real locations from The Walking Dead comicsBuild your Community Base & Expand into the Wasteland• Build houses to hold Survivors, a Town Hall to expand your city, a Workshop to craft items, and morePvP - Raid Enemies• Use your battle strategy to raid enemy factions for resources in the All Out War online mode• Strategic Multiplayer battles in a wide-open world filled with potential enemies and vicious walkers. Alliance Factions & Online Strategy• Multiplayer alliances and battle strategies keep you safe. Join allies in a faction to create a battle strategy and pool resources in the harsh world of The Walking Dead• Battle and build together with friends in multiplayer role-playing strategy gameplayBattle in Iconic The Walking Dead Locations• Fight alongside your faction for control of areas from The Walking Dead• Battle to conquer and defend locations like Alexandria, Woodbury, Sanctuary, and moreMake Strategized Decisions to Change the Story• Decisions impact the story mode and make each game campaign unique• Write your own Survivor story in this dynamic and compelling Walking Dead RPGLive In-Game Events • Play to obtain valuable resources and new, exclusive Survivors.Walkers tear at your city walls, while desperate Survivors rip apart the town’s foundations from the inside. When the time comes to fight, what will you choose?
descriptionHTML:
The Walking Dead Road to Survival is the definitive Walking Dead strategy RPG game, brought to you by Robert Kirkman, creator of The Walking Dead comic series.

Build your team of Survivors and develop battle strategies to lead them into battle in an uncompromising story, fraught with danger. Fight for survival against walkers and humans alike, using strategy to attack enemy weak points and deep RPG progression to decide your path. Build a town to keep the walkers at bay, but be warned – The horrors that lurk outside aren’t the only threat, and your decisions are all that stand between life and death.

Based on an all-new story from award-winning Walking Dead writer Jay Bonansinga, the dark aesthetic of this game reflects the uncompromising decisions you will need to make as you strategize for survival.

Stand with Michonne, Rick and other survivors from The Walking Dead, and join the epic battle against the darkest enemies from the Governor to Negan.

THE WALKING DEAD: ROAD TO SURVIVAL FEATURES:

Fight Walkers & Survivors
• Battle against fierce opponents and use your best strategy to survive
• Headshot! Land critical hits and deal crippling blows to your enemies
• Charge opponents with special melee and ranged attacks using deadly weapons like Michonne’s katana

Collect & Recruit Survivors
• Collect new Survivors from The Walking Dead universe, each with their own specialized battle strategy

Upgrade Your Survivors
• Level up and customize Survivors to enhance their fighting strategies, weapons and skills
• RPG progression makes your Survivors stronger as they cut down more walkers

Strategy Gameplay - Capitalize on Strengths & Exploit Weaknesses
• Battle strategy is key to scoring powerful hits – but watch out for retaliating strikes
• Your battle strategy is all that’s keeping the Survivors of Woodbury safe – Strategize and strike to win

Maps & Locations From The Walking Dead
• Explore a new 3D map featuring real locations from The Walking Dead comics

Build your Community Base & Expand into the Wasteland
• Build houses to hold Survivors, a Town Hall to expand your city, a Workshop to craft items, and more

PvP - Raid Enemies
• Use your battle strategy to raid enemy factions for resources in the All Out War online mode
• Strategic Multiplayer battles in a wide-open world filled with potential enemies and vicious walkers.

Alliance Factions & Online Strategy
• Multiplayer alliances and battle strategies keep you safe. Join allies in a faction to create a battle strategy and pool resources in the harsh world of The Walking Dead
• Battle and build together with friends in multiplayer role-playing strategy gameplay

Battle in Iconic The Walking Dead Locations
• Fight alongside your faction for control of areas from The Walking Dead
• Battle to conquer and defend locations like Alexandria, Woodbury, Sanctuary, and more

Make Strategized Decisions to Change the Story
• Decisions impact the story mode and make each game campaign unique
• Write your own Survivor story in this dynamic and compelling Walking Dead RPG

Live In-Game Events
• Play to obtain valuable resources and new, exclusive Survivors.

Walkers tear at your city walls, while desperate Survivors rip apart the town’s foundations from the inside. When the time comes to fight, what will you choose?

summary: The #1 Official Walking Dead Strategy RPG - Recruit your team to fight Zombies!
title: The Walking Dead: Road to Survival

If you don't have money to burn then don't play this game. This game is the embidiment of the 'pay to win' phrase and would make EA look like a baby when it comes to that. Levels are easy to scale up in the beginning but as you cross level 10 through 20, you'd realise that without paying through your nose, you are just fodder for paying players. Don't be a sheep they'd like you to be. On top of that, the game is riddled with bugs and the developers are unresponsive, unless again you are a paying player. Do yourself a favor and Invest your time in another game.
description: The hottest free to play multiplayer war game of 2017 is here! Become an admiral of invincible navy fleets in the best 3D interactive strategy game of naval warfare. Build your naval base and lead your powerful fleet into countless epic sea battles. Grow stronger by forging alliances with friends and build an empire together. Command the most iconic battleship, destroyer and aircraft to destroy your enemies in all out naval warfare! Why not join an alliance for true MMO glory and battle in the ultimate naval showdown – The Bermuda. Hunt the pirates and sea monsters wherever you may find them! comments: Lovely relaxing gam. I enjiuy it...so far. Now i'm at 115,  got the puzzle pieces to go to 116 but it's not taking me there,why? Is there not a next level? I am in the 3rd stage and i went to update the game as it keeps freezing, and now I'm back at 115! And if i read the reviews here i am not the only one that has this problem. And seems you guys don't care. I will defnitely rate this minus 1!!!! 28.12.2017

Submitted a report yesterday and you made out I was lying. I've submitted 2 reports since then with no reply.  When I pass a level my ticket count is not going up I'm now at the gate that is telling me I need a 100 tickets its pointless me going over other levels as the ticket has not increased. I was told to tell you when I'm at the gate, which I have done twice. Still ignored.  I really likes the game until this happened.

A fantastic match-3 game for all ages. Kudos to the creator of this game. How about coming out with a Rio 2: Match 3 Party? I'm not even close to the end on this one, if there is an end.  Just asking basically if it had been thought about. More levels are great too, with more birds. Love these critters. Thanks!!!

Haven't been able to play for 2 weeks. Submitted report after report and nothing has been done to fix the problem. Not very user friendly. Have full Wifi so that's not the problem. All my other games work great. No thanks. I shouldn't have to jump through hoops to play a game. Delete.

Love this cute and challenging game but with all of these types there should be an option to turn off auto hints.. Really annoying and I like to figure out the next move myself.. Same thing with the constant tutorial, match 3 isn't rocket science... Otherwise great job!!!

GREAT GAME, ADDICTIVE, LOVE IT!!!!!! HOWEVER, I have completed the first 2 locations, got the tickets that I need to proceed on the third location, but the game won't load the other levels... It keep saying i need atleast 77 tickets... I have 120 of them. I have uninstalled & reinstalled the game THREE TIMES but I am STILL stuck waiting. FIX THIS ASAP, PLEASE

Help Blu get everything he needs to throw an awesome party by solving puzzles, collecting medals, and unlocking new locations and party favors. Play beautiful levels of Match 3 gameplay set across stunning Brazilian landscapes. Have fun with all of your favorite characters from the hit movies or play against your friends!

***PUZZLE PARADISE***
Match, crush and swipe your way through hundreds of levels set within glorious locations, like the Amazon Jungle, Rio City and Copacabana Beach, with new ones being added all the time!

Collect all of your favorite characters from the Rio universe including Jewel, Nigel, Nico and others!

Progress by earning tickets and unlocking new levels! Upgrade your map with balloons, banners, confetti and a DJ Stage!

comments: I enjoy this game. graphics are pretty good for mobile game. By lvl 30ish though its gets grindy and there are some quest where the quest items are so hard to get.   I just wish the skill and stat descriptions gave more detail. I had to dig through the forum and googls to find info (if any) of certain stat and skill effects. Overall fun game.

I dont know if it has PVP.. Im still starting to explore this.. so far, I like it.. It's just the skill is somehow hard to click as you need to click the list first.. It would be really great if it is displayed on the lower right around the map.. instead of attack tab, skill tab should be separated each specialty :)
This is the best RPG game for mobile! It worth downloading it. They only have minor bugs but take a long time to load the data when you start playing it for the first time. Still, I LOVE THIS GAME

Its ok but for anyone thats new to a rpg game will get lost because some important tutorials aren't included in the beginning that should be. Like stat distribution and how to enhance your skills. Fixing that will make the game a bit more user-friendly.

This game worked fine on my galaxy s8 prior to the last update. Now all i get is errors about memory not responding and the game closes. Game was enjoyable. Until the issue is resolved, this review is mostly negative.
After last update my attack power is half it use to be. Why?? That sucks. I need a lot attack just to kill low level monster

comments: I'm honestly about to uninstall. I've been playing 3 days and it's making it impossible to complete the daily task. I can't even invite friends... Edit: it won't allow me to invite friends, I'm able to play one game a day unless I continuously buy more tokens...but with ads after every game, they get funding from them. I installed this game because the reviews were the best, but maybe it's just got a grudge against me!

I understand they are trying to make money off this app, but if you are going to charge someone 320 tickets to play 4 cards, the reward should be more than 70 tickets per win.  I mean, really?! Some people want to play bingo, but want something to work toward without being bored.  I played Bingo story and deleted it, because I had a lot of credits, but EVERY BOARD WAS THE SAME.  Also, the powerups in this game should be limited to what you have available, and not have to purchase because you are out of said power up.  It might make more people play if they are rewarded.  .  I mean the quests saying you will win 600 tickets if you complete the quest, but you're spending on the normal side 280+ tickets, really?  And no other options besides watching ad videos for free credits?  And I'm not saying to add a "download this app and run it for 3 tickets.  Reach level 300 for 40 tickets."  Rant over

Everything would be pretty neat, but there should be another way to get more tickets. I've been stuck at the New York state for several days now, cause I can only replay the first stages with the tickets from the daily bonus.
Love it. The only reason I didn't give 5's across the board is it gets costly per game as you gain levels. The games are way fun and you can play up to 8 cards !!!!!

There should be more ways to get or win more tickets and power-ups. I also think the costs per cards increases too much from board to board. Other than those two issues, I love this game. Would play more if there were other ways to get/win tickets, the purchase costs is ridiculous for the middle/working-class.  I'd rather pay my bills than buy fake in-game tickets that CAN'T win me REAL CASH. Thank you keep up the good work.
It's a fun game. You have to be quick near the end beacause the game seem to end while the caller is still calling the last number. You don't get a penalty for daubing the wrong number.

comments: Love this game. Second time I've played it. At level 46 I unlocked the whistles, at level 90 I finished the first puzzle, at level 95, I got my first carousel, at level 100 I had unlocked everything except the puppies...still need red puppy, at level 101 I got my first ferris wheel, at level 105 I got the first swinging ride, at level 121 I unlocked tier 7 & at lvl 130 I finished 2nd puzzle. Only thing I hate is the adds popping up as I touch the board, so it goes to the game & I have to exit. Edit: third time playing. March 2018. So much has changed!!! Quests, boxes, keys & now my game is saved...had to start from scratch but wont lose it again!!!

I've run 2 other apps to get bonus coins both at almost 1k each and I never got my coins. I finished the tutorial like it said I had to but zero coins were given for it. U shouldn't offer free coins to run other apps if u aren't going to give the coins for it. Will probably give up and delete bc of it.  Tried to give it a 2nd chance and did the flash light purchase to get 2268 coins and never got my coins. Why offer free coins if u won't give the free coins?  I emailed like recommend and sent proof like requested and still nothing. I smell a lawsuit for false advertisement. My $4.99 spend on a flashlight is going to make me thousands. Thanks for not doing ur job.

Extreme amount of ad pop ups. Usually loses dollars and coins. Fun but with all the flaws its not worth it. I played so far and it started over out of nowhere. Can't load or anything. Waste of my time

It's is nearly impossible to play because of the amount of pop-ups. In one minute, I counted 15 pop-ups. Even if you aren't touching the screen, whilst waiting on coins, it jumps from advertisement to advertisement. A decent game ruined by pop-ups.

It has its moments. With the abundance of ads present and the fact that the game gives notifications for things you cant get and the forced instructions at times it is a okay game but pretty boring after a while.

I really enjoy this game..I  originally began playing to earn credits for another game but drifted past level 7,which was the required level I intended to complete and stop playing. Next thing I knew I was clicking away, determined to get the next cute "prize," down the centre aisle. I looked up to see I was at level 10! Geez! I knew I was hooked when I found myself looking at my coin balance..found it satisfactory...smiling...i forgot my original game...now that's an addictive game!! Lol! I blame the cute puppy dog prize that lured me with its overwhelming cuteness..

總體不錯，希望桂子能有多些良心，活動別全是充值才能玩得好的，多給點元寶，現在低等玩家不充v基本上很難強起來
第一次寫的評論是8月10號。現在我來更新一下評論。差不多半年了，今天删遊戲。失望而去。活動千篇一律。每天叫人課金，同時活動經常有問題/bug。對非台灣玩家不友善(港澳玩家極少活動可以參加)反正我是不會玩的了，你們繼續課吧，呵呵

This is a fascinating game where you're a concubine battling it out with the thousands upon thousands of other concubines (players) vying for the emperor's affection. The YouTube ads are a bit misleading, and don't represent actual gameplay. Most of the game involves you getting an army of souls of historical  figures so you can fight other people's armies to continue the story  or get crucial items that will help level up your army. There's the option to slap/curse people, but most of the existing players apparently take this game WAY too seriously, and you can cause party wars and get disowned by your own party just by 宮鬥 ing easily offended people, which is pretty dumb since this game actively encourages you to do it. I've been told and reprimanded (?!?!?) to "play nice so everyone can have a good time," which defeats the purpose and entertainment of this game...? There's definitely many layers to this game, and a complete time-suck (usually takes me about 2-3 hours of daily gameplay to finish all the missions to get the daily rewards). Very entertaining (and would be more entertaining if most of the players had thicker skin and don't flip out and try to get you destroyed in the game just because their avatar looks bruised for like an hour after a slapping).
Ever sinve the latest update, my phone has been constantly overheated.

comments: Perty good Edit: We're in the middle of an event and the game won't load. Finally says down for maintenance. It would be nice to get a heads up on when that happens. Gonna put a hindrance on the event that's over on Friday. Do hope it's resolved soon. Still like the game tho, but would like it better if I can play.

Well a very basic game, as any other idle game. Has no real extra things that would wow you. Notifications less than a minute after closing the app (or simply pressing home) can get very annoying. As if I need a notification to tell me I closed the game.

Right.  First off, If you are not a fan of Idle games, then don't play. This is the epitome of an Idle game.   The Early game is pretty simple. Click, Collect, Make your way to Level 80. You have the option to buy gold, but I wouldn't bother.   Multiplyers come from a variety of Sources, and regular events give permanent boosts to the Main game.   Good to pick up and play for 10 minutes at different points of the day, Deep enough to just about keep my intrest beyond this.   Issues. Events: They keep adding new things to Events and not really following up on them. Betting hasn't been used in a while, Costumes are confusing, and the card collection in a previous event was a fairly obvious cash grab, requiring that upgrade the cards you have using gold.  Event's are often straight copy pastes of previous events, and will sometimes continue to reference previous events'  All in, pretty good.

Well guess they deleted my last post cause I complained that the game took up 1.8 gig till I uninstalled it and reinstalled it then lost my saves because of bad programming.   Don't waste your time or money on this company.

One of the best "tap" games. Love the satirical theme. Who would have thought that politics and money were SO interconnected😁. Just to be clear to some, I AM being sarcastic!!!! Great time waster. And that's NOT fake news.

They put so many buttons to purchase things ion the main screen. When tapping as is the nature of the game, it brings up confirmation for your purchases. If you're trying to play fast, you could easily spend $20 in mere seconds without noticing. Put all the purchases in one place instead of cheating players.
description: Build the best democracy that money can buy in this innovative political idle game! Enlist the help of lobbies in order to raise money for your political campaigns. However, lobbies won’t be enough to get you to the top by themselves. Recruit staffers to help generate revenue and woo endorsements from top politicians for unique and powerful bonuses.Tap your way from a lowly campaign volunteer up to the highest office in the land!KEY FEATURES:*Political Tapping Fun - With tons of way to earn money and rise to new and more powerful offices, how you go about doing it is up to you. Do you concentrate on tapping for cash, pay staffers to do it for you, or focus on powerful political lobbies to passively generate money while you’re offline?*Deep Strategy - Deciding which party to run for or which lobbies to invest in is just the tip of the iceberg. Retire from your campaigns in order to score coveted political capital that you can spend on endorsements from powerful party leaders.*Tons of Content - Unlock dozens of powerful upgrades that open up even more possibilities to play the game any way you want. Love achievements? There are oodles of trophies just waiting to be collected!Please Note: Pocket Politics is a free-to-play game, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
descriptionHTML:
Build the best democracy that money can buy in this innovative political idle game!

Enlist the help of lobbies in order to raise money for your political campaigns. However, lobbies won’t be enough to get you to the top by themselves. Recruit staffers to help generate revenue and woo endorsements from top politicians for unique and powerful bonuses.Tap your way from a lowly campaign volunteer up to the highest office in the land!

KEY FEATURES:

*Political Tapping Fun - With tons of way to earn money and rise to new and more powerful offices, how you go about doing it is up to you. Do you concentrate on tapping for cash, pay staffers to do it for you, or focus on powerful political lobbies to passively generate money while you’re offline?

*Deep Strategy - Deciding which party to run for or which lobbies to invest in is just the tip of the iceberg. Retire from your campaigns in order to score coveted political capital that you can spend on endorsements from powerful party leaders.

*Tons of Content - Unlock dozens of powerful upgrades that open up even more possibilities to play the game any way you want. Love achievements? There are oodles of trophies just waiting to be collected!

Please Note: Pocket Politics is a free-to-play game, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

comments: Took me a very long time, but I beat this game and absolutely loved it! I can't wait for the next chapter!  Please keep updating and adding new things! My only suggestion is maybe if someone takes the time to watch an ad for a lavastone maybe give them 2 or something those ads are long lol

I do really like this game. But I have to admit I do not think it is as good as the other virtual villager games. Looks fantastic but it's missing the schools and other things. I miss being able to get a master doctor. I also think compared to the other games. The tech points are harder to get and it's not as fun or exciting upgrading in this game as it was with the other games.. I still enjoy it but I just feel like it's missing something.

I love this series. One thing I would like to say is things should happen at a set time or after you finish something. I still have 4 puzzles that I am no closer to finishing then I was a week ago. But these games are fun and are a great way to pass the time. I actually play it on my laptop so it's a little easier for me.

I love the game so much! I have played every other virtual villagers game and I love all of them; they are the best games ever. It's really challenging to get items that you need so you can complete a puzzle. It took me forever to finish chapter 1, but I finally finished 3 months ago, so now I'm waiting for chapter 2. It's really fun. Although it took forever to get the box to decorate the tree and to get the crab, but they were not as difficult as trying to get the pan to pan the gold because I couldn't see where it's location was and I looked everywhere, but I ended up finding it. Then there was the problem with trying to get the gold, becase the pan disappeared after getting the first gold. It was difficult to find the location to get the other two gold nuggets because I couldn't tap the area to find it, I could only find it by dropping a villager on it ( again I don't know where the location is) to get the gold. But I ended up finding them and in a way it was actually pretty fun for me to try and get the gold because it was challenging, but it did take forever. All'in'all it's a really good game; I just suggest (for the sake of other players) to make it possible to find the pan and the location to get the gold. I still love the game and I can't wait for chapter 2, and I hope for more in the future, you guys are the best so keep up the good work.  Thanks for the great game.

Game has no instructions, no way of knowing what needs to be crafted etc,  huts can only be built when technology is learnt, and then no huts are used? Etc love shack and crafting... there are certain things you CANT pick up despite being told you can... no way of lighting the fire, no way of mixing herbs without water, but you have water in the craft hut?   No way of catching butterflies... i relised a giant octopus that sits and dose nothing..lolol crazy game massive improvements needed hence the 3 stars...

I really  like  this game and all the villager games, also virtual families  2. I'm  disappointed  that  I  had to start over because of an upgrade issue that was not fixed. I lost all my progress. Luckily  I didn't  lose the heron and lemur that I paid for. Customer services  could use improvement .
description: ** Please note: this game requires an active internet connection! ** Return to the famed and mystical island of Isola and be drawn into the latest sequel in the beloved Virtual Villagers series! In the wake of a volcanic terror on the neighboring island of Asura, a family has made their way to Isola, seeking a new home. As their boat lands on the beach, they are greeted by a strange man and begin to explore this mysterious new world. The beautiful and curious island of Isola was once a paradise home to a thriving civilization but has gone to ruin and untamed jungle. The twists and turns will leave you discovering new, interactive, magical moments at every turn! Here are some of the amazing features we can’t wait to share!! - Be the master of your own village: With real-time simulation, the ability to customize your villagers’ names and game-changing, random island events, no two tribes will ever be quite the same!- Train villagers to become proficient at various skills to perform tasks around the island and survive their new-found world.- Explore the charmed island to solve all-new puzzles, and uncover mysterious island secrets.- Gather and combine resources from around your new virtual home to craft rare resources and unlock rewards from completed collections.- Breed, heal and care for your beloved village children and families; build a sustainable village up from ruins; unlock improved food sources with farming and fishing; craft unique resources for puzzles and collections; and so much more! - Power-up villagers with magical necklaces, and improve productivity, life expectancy and much more for your entire village with magical totems and potions!- Acquire homes for two unique island pets that will help weed out pests and discover magical items around the island. - Reincarnate cherished villagers with all their skills.- Earn daily rewards! Also available in the Last Day of Work franchise:- Virtual Villagers Series (Origins, A New Home, New Believers, Lost Children, Secret City and The Tree of Life) - Virtual Families 2 Series- Virtual Town- Fish Tycoon Series- Plant Tycoon- San Francisco Zoo
descriptionHTML:
** Please note: this game requires an active internet connection! **

Return to the famed and mystical island of Isola and be drawn into the latest sequel in the beloved Virtual Villagers series! In the wake of a volcanic terror on the neighboring island of Asura, a family has made their way to Isola, seeking a new home. As their boat lands on the beach, they are greeted by a strange man and begin to explore this mysterious new world.

The beautiful and curious island of Isola was once a paradise home to a thriving civilization but has gone to ruin and untamed jungle. The twists and turns will leave you discovering new, interactive, magical moments at every turn!

Here are some of the amazing features we can’t wait to share!!

- Be the master of your own village: With real-time simulation, the ability to customize your villagers’ names and game-changing, random island events, no two tribes will ever be quite the same!
- Train villagers to become proficient at various skills to perform tasks around the island and survive their new-found world.
- Explore the charmed island to solve all-new puzzles, and uncover mysterious island secrets.
- Gather and combine resources from around your new virtual home to craft rare resources and unlock rewards from completed collections.
- Breed, heal and care for your beloved village children and families; build a sustainable village up from ruins; unlock improved food sources with farming and fishing; craft unique resources for puzzles and collections; and so much more!
- Power-up villagers with magical necklaces, and improve productivity, life expectancy and much more for your entire village with magical totems and potions!
- Acquire homes for two unique island pets that will help weed out pests and discover magical items around the island.
- Reincarnate cherished villagers with all their skills.
- Earn daily rewards!

Also available in the Last Day of Work franchise:
- Virtual Villagers Series (Origins, A New Home, New Believers, Lost Children, Secret City and The Tree of Life)
- Virtual Families 2 Series
- Virtual Town
- Fish Tycoon Series
- Plant Tycoon
- San Francisco Zoo

Also developers never responded to my email regarding something else. I've spent $40 bucks on this game in the 1st few days I've been playing and I think I'll keep my lil money to myself now since they haven't fixed the issue.

Would give 5 stars but after you get to a certain level you have to spend real money to get farther. I have spend 65 dollars on this game so far and have been scammed so many times. Its a super fun game but so hard to get anywhere. You should be able to stock up shields. Also its stupid that you have to pay to talk. I might get the VIP if some things changed.

The problem I have is you haven't given the radio toy for the bear and also you can't unfreeze the guy because you don't give out the items to do it even after defeating the monster. You still can't get enough fire logs plus still no radio toy for the bear? Plus should give more coins it is a lot in higher levels

Losing some snowballs...... Would like to get more than six spins in one hour..... especially when there are large amounts needed to buy..... Mining pigs....really so much when we pay large amounts and our pay is so low.....

I helped my friend defeating leonardo.i used 10 bombs .but when i attacked leonardo .there was still 1 % left .so someone else had complited it.and now i went there to claim reward there was no reward for me.i have not claimed that reward. 2nd thing you have made puzzle number 9 so much rare not even me but everyone is not getting it. Please fix this.i will give 5 stars back.

Loved this game my planet gets distroyed everyday once I almost get it built. I played several times all day. Loved this game. I used to get angels but not any more. Been on same island for weeks. I love building my planet so fun. But not getting distroyed a minutes later. I've noticed alot of my friends stopped playing too due to same problem. 😥

descriptionHTML:
***Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers***

Piggy:" Lords and Ladies, one of your friends just attacked your island, you must commit revenge! Spin the wheel to earn more gold and shields!" --Invite your Facebook friends to join Piggy Boom!

Build your exclusive islands of your own with the help of little cute pets, push the button and spin the wheel, win some luck today!

Have fun with other players and steal their gold, protect your island from invasion with your pets

▶Features
• Magic Wheel
Every one loves having some luck in a game and Piggy Boom gives you free daily chances to spin the wheel and win heaps of coins!

• Theme islands
Every casual game players love to build and have a customized avatar!
In Piggy Boom, hundreds of themed islands wait for you to unlock them and build. The more you build, the more islands you will have


• Play with Friends
Invite your best friends and compete with global players. Are you under attack and want a revenge? Call your friends and attack together.

• Miner System
Be a miner and keep digging, a rich gold mine is waiting for you to explore in the game! Become the richest player in the game for a second.

• Cute Pets
Get your daily dose of cuteness with your adorable pets and protect your island together. Remember to feed your cute pet and level it up.

More features for you to find in Piggy Boom. Join us today and play with millions players all over the world!

NOTICE: Items are available for purchase in the game.

In process of the game, we may need permissions listed as below:
1. WRITE/READ EXTERNAL STORAGE
We use this permission to help players send their screenshots to us, in cases when bugs have occurred. This helps us locate where the problem is and solve it.
2. READ/RECEIVE/SEND SMS
We use this permission to verify the identities of users, retrieve accounts, guarantee the safety of accounts, and allow players to share the game to friends at the same time.
3. RECORD_AUDIO
We use this permission to allow players to audio chat in the game.
------------------------------------------
Find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PiggyBoomApp/

comments: Fun, easy to play, complex to reach higher levels, this game has, so far, been great. No microtransactions (thus far) to continue playing, which is a huge plus. A few have stated a couple of bugs, which I agree with, adding only one other comment; I do wish their was an offline option for at least some gameplay. Online still necessary for a lot, but offline to run some dungeons. This could, in theory, help with some server space, as well.

This game is one of the best game I ever played in mobile. I love the graphic which is cute and there is so many content, so it's not boring. And another positive side, you can get the special currency easily in the game. It's not a p2w games ^^ but the sign board was one of the best micro transaction I've ever seen. Try it and you'll see.. it's a lot of fun ^^

I've been looking for a game like this for ages! I was a fan of Runestone Keeper and wanted something similar for my phone. These guys knocked it out of the park. I rarely spend money on phone games, but these guys deserve every penny and accolade coming their way. Fun and  simple, yet brilliant in execution and design. Tons of content already, and I can't wait to see what's next. Keep up the great work!

This game is so much fun! My only complaint is that the gear is gone when done with the maze, so you start it over. As well as "learning new titles". It gets kinda old having to start that over every time you beat a full maze. But that aside, this game is definitely addictive! Keep up the great work!

Your game is amazing. You guys are amazing. After everything you went through, you deserve these stars at the very least. Your game isn't pay to win, it's just a grand experience and I love it.  One of the BEST games on the market easily.  Keep up the good work, you're all doing fantastic.  Respect

I've been playing like nine months and it's very addictive you really grow and have many choices. It's truly free to play and gems are everywhere. Buying a signboard for real money is the best bang for your buck and a lizard if you feel like buying something else.  Totally recommend it. I only hate getting creator gumball is so expensive other than that it's a great game. It's a game that goes as fast or as slow as you feel like playing.

Visit http://qcplay.helpshift.com/a/gumballs-dungeons or https://www.facebook.com/gumballs.dungeons or contact us in game by going to Settings > Guide.Forums & Guide:English:    https://goo.gl/ecChhsWiki:http://gdmaze.wikia.comTerms of Service:http://rs.qcplay.com/html/Terms_of_service.htmlIt's necessary to use the below permissions:RECORD_AUDIOThere is a 'Voice Chat' function in the game, this function allows users to send the voice messages to each other, so it's necessary to use the RECORD_AUDIO permission.The video below shows how it works in the game:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KqNb75QXq8g&feature=youtu.be  GET_ACCOUNTSIn order to allow users to sign in the game with Google account, it's necessary to grant access to the GET_ACCOUNTS permission when signing in with google at the first time.
descriptionHTML:
Brand new Adventure & RPG game of 2018. FREE to Play Now! (Game for free)

DESCRIPTION
This is a mysterious adventure. How long can you survive during the unknown journey? Enter the Gumballs & Dungeons!Start off a great adventure with world wide players,lead your Swordsman,Demon Hunter,Mage and Death Knight to beat the Evil Dominator of the Erathia continent.

FEATURES
● Explore the Gumballs & Dungeons with world wide players,challenge friends and check leaderboards and achievements
● Experience more than 12 different game maps and hidden stages, including Magic Forest, Sage's Tower, Dracula's Castle, Skeleton Island ...
● Build and upgrade your GUMBALL Fleet,go to the celestial city, challenge world wide players and win resources to upgrade your fleet.
● Collect powerful new gumballs and upgrade existing ones,including Mage, Swordsman, Odin, Vampire,Zombie ...
● Upgrade your Alchemist Workshop which can produce coins and resources constantly
● You can also read many wonderful stories that have more than 100,000 words in the game

SUPPORT
Are you having problems? Visit http://qcplay.helpshift.com/a/gumballs-dungeons or https://www.facebook.com/gumballs.dungeons or contact us in game by going to Settings > Guide.

Forums & Guide:
English: https://goo.gl/ecChhs

Wiki:
http://gdmaze.wikia.com

Terms of Service:
http://rs.qcplay.com/html/Terms_of_service.html

It's necessary to use the below permissions:

RECORD_AUDIO
There is a 'Voice Chat' function in the game, this function allows users to send the voice messages to each other, so it's necessary to use the RECORD_AUDIO permission.
The video below shows how it works in the game:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KqNb75QXq8g&feature=youtu.be

GET_ACCOUNTS
In order to allow users to sign in the game with Google account, it's necessary to grant access to the GET_ACCOUNTS permission when signing in with google at the first time.

comments: Awesome game. just a few comments. you guys should have the stuff that's automatically generated (mining for example) running in the background even while the app is closed because otherwise you're just getting maybe 100 every now and then and you feel like you're getting nothing. would be nice for the money that comes every minute to also still run even while the app is off

Great idle game that you can play as much or as little as you want, even if you only have a few minutes. My only gripe is all the inactive guilds. Finding a guild with an active guild master is virtually impossible, and when the gm quits all guild upgrading is over. It's also frustrating that all the upgrades you earn for a guild stay with the guild so if your guild master comes back after 6 months and kicks you, you get to start from scratch with no bonuses.

This game is actually really good. Not as confusing as the picture shows. Lots to explore.   The only thing I would change for a 5 star it to not stop us from battling after 1 hour of playing.  Hypecrafter NX youtuber Sighing out.

This game is wildly disproportionate.... There are players who spend thousands of dollars on in-app purchases and have insane amounts of power so they pick on the players who can't afford to do the same. The amount of resources required to upgrade technology and buildings becomes astronomical very quickly and mining for the resources needed is impossible due to the fact that the huge players hunt mines. Adding to this, every time your fleet gets hit on a mine or a base you lose 20% of that fleet, which costs you more resources to build it back up, compounding the impossibility to grow unless you spend insane amounts of money. If you don't have ridiculous amounts of money to waste on this game, don't bother downloading it.

description: The highly anticipated AAA title War of Warship is the latest in a series of free-to-play, historical online combat games to be added to the wargames portfolio. Command history's most iconic war vessels as you build your own massive naval fleet. Level up important tech modules and prepare to dominate the oceans!With four classes of ship, a myriad of upgrades and strategically designed environments, the action never ends. Every match is a unique experience. Hours of strategy, tactical gameplay and pulse-pounding combat await all who take the helm in War of Warships!= Features =Construction of naval base!All over the world can build a naval base, you also need to defend against enemy attacks.Naval construction!Build a powerful naval fleet, more than 20 kinds of types of warships.Form huge Alliances!Join players from around the world, make friends and become allies. There is strength in numbers, so you can work together and take on others in exciting campaign.World War!As you get stronger, you can wage war on other countries and occupied them.Research cutting edge technology!Research new technologies, new equipment and can build warships. Leading technology has a great impact on the entire country.
descriptionHTML:
The highly anticipated AAA title War of Warship is the latest in a series of free-to-play, historical online combat games to be added to the wargames portfolio. Command history's most iconic war vessels as you build your own massive naval fleet. Level up important tech modules and prepare to dominate the oceans!

With four classes of ship, a myriad of upgrades and strategically designed environments, the action never ends. Every match is a unique experience. Hours of strategy, tactical gameplay and pulse-pounding combat await all who take the helm in War of Warships!

= Features =

Construction of naval base!
All over the world can build a naval base, you also need to defend against enemy attacks.

Naval construction!
Build a powerful naval fleet, more than 20 kinds of types of warships.

Form huge Alliances!
Join players from around the world, make friends and become allies. There is strength in numbers, so you can work together and take on others in exciting campaign.

World War!
As you get stronger, you can wage war on other countries and occupied them.

Research cutting edge technology!
Research new technologies, new equipment and can build warships. Leading technology has a great impact on the entire country.

comments: It's enjoyable enough but the prices are an absolute joke. I usually spend quite a bit of money on apps, so I was all set to buy the premium package, expecting it to be between 2 and 4 quid a month. This is absolutely ridiculous - almost £10 a month, as if the game isn't already dripping with ads. It's greedy.
The cost for extra packs is unbelievably expensive! I would not pay more than 10.00 TOTAL. Also every day you should get 3 hints and 2 hints for solving each game

One of the best free apps out there. Almost every puzzle seems overwhelming, but if you skip the ones you don't know, and solve the ones you do know, it starts filling in the blanks and most of the time you can solve the whole puzzle with no hints. Fun game!
Good game but over $20 per month is WAY beyond my budget. Too bad as I was hooked until I saw the price. Please contact me if you ever lower the cost to a reasonable amount. :(
This is one of the most   addictive games I've ever played!! Keeps me up for hours, even when I have an extremely hard time keeping my eyes open!  I could play 24/7, it's that much fun!!

Love this game! Would give it 5 stars if the paid piece wasn't subscription based and so expensive. 20 bucks per month is ridiculous, wish it was more affordable so I could support the developers. Once I finish the free section I will have to uninstall.
description: - Best of 2017 Google Play store - A new crossword experience- Challenge yourself with countless puzzles- Relax while exploring thematic worlds- Become a trivia master- Word games reinvented- Solve puzzles and have fun while you learn- Enjoy this exclusive crossword gameplay- Excel at brain games- A brand-new word game challenge- Solve crosswords anywhere you areJoin CodyCross, a friendly alien that has crash-landed on Earth and counts on your help to learn about our planet! Travel across space and time as you unveil our planet's history and humanity’s accomplishments through themed puzzles in this challenging word game. Solve crosswords and explore beautiful sceneries, use your knowledge and skills in a one-of-a-kind word game, where every correct answer takes you closer to completing the puzzle and revealing the secret word! Highlights: - Explore beautifully designed worlds with hundreds of levels to play the best crosswords - Each world brings new themes and genres that will challenge the wisest of puzzle lovers- Have some fun while testing your knowledge with brain games- Innovative gameplay that brings a new twist to crossword puzzles- Test your language skills through these brain games- If you get stuck on a question in our word game, use the power-up to reveal a letter- Solve crosswords to train your brain - Sync your progress across all devices by connecting to Facebook- Solve crosswords and play different levels in offline mode if you don’t have internet connection (with limited features)- You can play tons of puzzles for free on adventure mode or subscribe for special packs in this word game.About subscription:- A subscription is offered within the app for enjoying special themed puzzles in your desired difficulty (hard, medium, easy and kids) with fresh new content every week.

description: 感謝您下載《問劍蒼穹》,2017年度最具良心的MMORPG精品！給你五大必玩理由：『極致3D畫質  經典仙俠背景』--極致精美的3D畫質帶給你身臨其境的視覺享受！『指尖痛快操作 不要太過爽了』--超流暢動作引擎帶給你前所未有的痛快手感！『萬人同屏PK  仙城爭霸大亂鬥』--PVP極致戰鬥體驗，萬人同屏跨服爭霸，誰主沉浮！『巨帥拉風時裝 搭配百變外觀』--禦劍飛行馳聘仙境，馭獸萌寵帶妹浪，任君百變搭配！『仙侶結緣雙修 邂逅美好緣分』--尋仙問情，真人語音聊天，帶妹子甜蜜共闖夫妻副本！四種新穎職業、三大陣營、全自由PK系統、個人巔峰競技場、千人皇城爭霸戰等玩法。注重職業間平衡及操作體驗，輔以細緻的美術風格，為玩家塑造真實震撼的戰鬥體驗！【製作團隊】重金聘請遊戲業內資深製作人規劃打造，更與多位國際知名優秀畫師合作，對每一個遊戲場景逐一進行打磨細化。卓越的策劃團隊，對每個職業的數值都精益求精，力求平衡。為求達到最好標準，更好的呈現這個用心之作，邀請了上千名骨灰級高玩進行了長達半年的評測優化。只出精品，不留遺憾。【媒體評價】17173遊戲門戶：一個不可多得的3D手遊，製作精良，畫質一流。新浪遊戲網：傳承了端遊經典，角色、環境、聲效的質量都遠超一般手遊。九遊手機網遊：經典的仙俠風格一下子把人帶進那個奇幻的世界裡面，值得深入體驗。葉子豬遊戲網：遊戲操作暢爽，戰鬥走位非常重要！可玩性非常強！【遊戲特色】『超經典！原汁原味仙俠情懷』以玄幻修真為基調，蘊涵著濃濃的古樸仙俠題材，其真實唯美的遊戲畫面，氣勢磅礴的遊戲場景，勾畫出一幅幅宛若飄渺仙境的東方美卷，搭配有古典樂器演奏的音樂背景，讓你瞬間穿越時空，置身於恬靜飄渺的玄幻世界！。『超過癮！3D畫質痛快操作』運用了大量的3D粒子特效技術，畫面寫實精細、張力十足，細膩柔潤，流光溢彩，柔美光暈應有盡有，亦幻亦真如臨仙境；全景無息無限制PVP，戰力比拼，全屏炸屏特效帶來前所未有的視覺衝擊和痛快手感，超流暢的戰鬥引擎搭配風騷走位元元，熱血戰鬥盡在掌中，再次釋放你的超神操作！『超好玩！零負擔升級毫無壓力』恢弘龐大的背景架構，讓你領略完整的修仙體驗；整個碎片時間不勞累，讓你輕鬆操作即可變神仙；經典零負擔，四大職業任玩轉，蘿莉禦姐任你選，近擊遠攻自由轉換；掛機、征途中等級狂飆，戰力爆表，三界任主宰！『超屌了！羽翼坐騎仙劍酷翻了』就要這麼好看，怎麼能少得了百變的超屌外觀呢？原創獨特形象—另類的羽翼、拉風的時裝、超炫的仙劍、霸氣的坐騎、屌炸天的法陣、更有現代明星寵物（超能大白，呆萌小黃人，賤賤熊本熊等等）任君收集，隨意搭配，燃爆全場！啟動屬性，飆升屬性，助戰殺敵！『超有料！特色副本海量玩法』攻城掠地、廝殺亂鬥占城奪寶，瘋狂殺戮！熱血跨服，風雲領袖巔峰對決，問鼎至尊！全城熱戀，仙侶纏綿雙修，場景夢幻精美，攜女神芳心同遊仙界！兄弟、仙侶，一個都不能少！ 【新人豪禮】七日狂歡，豪禮元寶送不停！首儲超贊，即送光武加翅膀！投資回饋，輕鬆翻倍買買買！至尊會員，天天登入拿元寶！請注意，play game 是免費的！您可以免費下載和使用。您也可以在遊戲中購買一些物品以提升遊戲速度！====================================================遊戲支援： 少俠您遇到問題了嗎？請通過如下方式聯繫我們：官方Facebook：https://www.facebook.com/eyouwjcq/官方微信(WeChat)：eyougamewjcq 官方Email：support@eyougame.com=======================權限說明WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGEREAD_EXTERNAL_STORAGE遊戲啟動時候，加載資源緩存到本地內存卡。方便以後用戶能快速進行遊戲RECORD_AUDIO遊戲內玩家溝通使用語音功能CAMERA遊戲內玩家拍照，上傳頭像

description: War Storm: Clash of Heroes is a Global Strategy MMO mobile game. Players take control of the legion of heroes and a castle, a stronghold, a nation, and all its subjects. Summon brave heroes of war to your cause, hone their skills or magic in combat, send them to the frontier, and use their unique abilities to turn the tide of battle, watch the epic scene of clash of elites! Form alliances with other players, defend Alliance Strongholds and castles against your enemies and take your revenge with your ally by Rally Attacks, take the chance and wow the world! Become a royale king of civil age and clash off the invading demon legions, or those vicious warlord armies who surge into ally's city. Write your own epic story in chaos; let the glory of might shine in honor!-GAME FEATURES-● Free Social Strategy MMO Mobile Game● Innovative world map tactics! Take control of resources to expand your royale empire and position your forces in camps around the map to protect the kingdom in chaos!● Complete Quests to win Heroes to your cause, or Summon them from beyond with Soul Shards recovered in the frontier of battle.● Craft weapons & armor for your Heroes from rare hearth materials found around the world map.● Form alliances with friends around the world to complete Alliance Quests, Send Aid to ally's nation, and Rally Attack your enemies!● Seize, develop and defend an Alliance Stronghold with your allies.● Sectioned World Map - growing your empire might give you access to new places!● Build diverse legions of foot soldiers, archers, mages, catapults and more! Outsmart your enemies by outfitting the winning combinations in battle.● Fight hellish monster legion under the leadership of Arch Demon. Become a powerful clasher and you might have to fight the Demon himself!Problems or suggestions? We would love to hear from you! descriptionHTML:
War Storm: Clash of Heroes is a Global Strategy MMO mobile game. Players take control of the legion of heroes and a castle, a stronghold, a nation, and all its subjects. Summon brave heroes of war to your cause, hone their skills or magic in combat, send them to the frontier, and use their unique abilities to turn the tide of battle, watch the epic scene of clash of elites! Form alliances with other players, defend Alliance Strongholds and castles against your enemies and take your revenge with your ally by Rally Attacks, take the chance and wow the world! Become a royale king of civil age and clash off the invading demon legions, or those vicious warlord armies who surge into ally's city. Write your own epic story in chaos; let the glory of might shine in honor!

-GAME FEATURES-

● Free Social Strategy MMO Mobile Game
● Innovative world map tactics! Take control of resources to expand your royale empire and position your forces in camps around the map to protect the kingdom in chaos!
● Complete Quests to win Heroes to your cause, or Summon them from beyond with Soul Shards recovered in the frontier of battle.
● Craft weapons & armor for your Heroes from rare hearth materials found around the world map.
● Form alliances with friends around the world to complete Alliance Quests, Send Aid to ally's nation, and Rally Attack your enemies!
● Seize, develop and defend an Alliance Stronghold with your allies.
● Sectioned World Map - growing your empire might give you access to new places!
● Build diverse legions of foot soldiers, archers, mages, catapults and more! Outsmart your enemies by outfitting the winning combinations in battle.
● Fight hellish monster legion under the leadership of Arch Demon. Become a powerful clasher and you might have to fight the Demon himself!

Problems or suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support via email: support@hourgames.com

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarStormCOH
developerAddress: Rm. 19C, Lockhart Ctr., 301-307 Lockhart Rd., Wan Chai, Hong Kong

title: WarStorm: Clash of Heroes

comments: This looks nothing like advertised. After a certain level the additional research que is disabled and you're expected to buy it back. No explanations on some features, you have to figure it out by trial and error wasting resources. I'm at castle level 15, dragon level makes no difference so far only troop level does. Events are useless because the top spenders take everything before you can even find the location. Misleading descriptions in-game costing you resources. This is utter BS and far from anything tactical as advertised. Drains battery faster than any app/game I've ever encountered

Well not only do i get friend requests from people who haven't sent them I get endless Agatha messages about world tip bosses I can't fight bloody annoying tried in game customer services but the form won't  load!

Love this game love creativity love the dragons would also like to know how to upgrade the dragons though that is my only concern other than that this is a really supportive game nice community group easy power easy levels and I love it keep up the good work guys
It's a game that I want to keep. I think that they should fix somethings but it's a great game in my opinion.
A really addictive fast past game but it's still developing but it's still really fun.
Where is alliance farm !!! ?

comments: I reckon this game is so good! I reckon it needs a test mode track so when you finish fixing the car fully to 100% you can test it. And probably alot more cars to fix, and also instead of having just one place where there are garages. You can go all over the world to different type of country's where there are different cars like Australia has commodores, Japan of skyline etc. Love this game so much ❤ hope you take this into exception

Overall the game is exactly what you think it would be, a mobile version of car mechanic simulator 2018. That being said the rotate and zoom features of the camera can be a little irritating at times. It's also very hard to make money to get to your 4th level of tools when you can't completely repair the majority of cars that you get. It can be a little frustrating to purchase a car only to realize that you cannot completely restore it.

Great game and efforts of game generating team are appreciated. I wld suggest to add few things like  tires wheel rims tinted glass at extra cost and if used will pay more while selling. Also sometimes when we buy car from barn in some cases few parts could be made missing so that player wld need to search and then purchase new to add more fun. After u get all tools and all cards then it is boaring....

Trying to find a support link?? I have all tools yet wont give me a bonus.... Love the game. Camera can be a pain sometimes but you learn where to and where not to touch parts. Also why not have buyers or clients stop in... Finishing a car 100% and only making 2k after putting wok into the car Then 10k into parts... I would fire the guy selling cars... Just my two cents.

For the developers: this game is broken. I play on tablet Galaxi tab A   Start the game Remove battery Buy new battery Install new battery Cant tap the sell option Game freeze Nothing work Retart the game 5 times always the same

Nothing like the older apps like this. Camera control is hard, going from warehouse to parts catalogue constantly to remember bad parts to replace is a pain, then an add plays further impairing your memory. Disassembly  got way less interactive and so far I can't repair parts, just  purchase from a catalog.

comments: The game is good (played like 5 missions so far) but i feel like there should be a jump and crouch feature, even if its just a jump feature. Maybe make some levels where you gotta utilize the jumping, maybe throw in some jet packs during some missions/raids to get to a certain area to either continue the mission and/or find some hidden crates. Also, maybe add some melee weapons too?  Besides that, the game is fun, the graphics are beautiful, the gameplay could improve tho.

Its awesome. Running smooth with maxed graphics on s8+ and I had no problems while playing it for 10+ hours.  May be starting area could be expanded along with more multiplayer features and interactions. More unique missions between lvl 11 and 15. Also smaller package (5$) could be added. P.S crashes when collecting contract rewards ...Puzzles sucks. Avoid multiplayer and arena untill is fixed

This game has little bit inspiration from many big games like destiny (duh), titanfall, doom. The game does have similarities to dead trigger. All the random loot is cosmetic, guns are easily obtained through missions. Good performance on my S7, but need internet 24×7 to run, even during campaign.

The graphic is awesome.But the game sometimes crashes when entering the casino full of people. Also, add chat system in co-op modes. It's hard to make people understand the puzzles without a chat. Add jump,crouch. It will make the game more attractive and the things are also needed for a game like this. I love the game. Keep adding new things, just don't turn the game into mostly pay to play game.Thanks.

Literally the best mobile game I have ever played. All IAP so far is cosmetic, which is great. Very similar to destiny with it's own flavor. I do wish you we're able to jump though and shotguns in pvp are OP. Game is optimized well for my mid-grade device. However, it won't run on my gf's ZTE Grand X Max which is very unfortunate considering it's basically the same phone as mine. Hopefully this changes soon because we really looked forward to playing together. Download this game!!!

Giving the review after 24hrs of gameplay. Have to say that it's awesome. Cudos to the creators. Loving the gaming experience. Graphics rendering should be calibrated more. Make sure to do that in next update. Coins and slots are hard to obtain. Many of them don't want  to spend real money so better give some daily tasks to complete and earn coins.

In the futuristic world of Shadowgun Legends, humanity is under attack from a deadly alien invader. The last line of defence are the Shadowguns, legendary warriors and heroes. Save humanity from an alien invader in an epic Story Campaign spanning over 200+ mission on 4 diverse planets

CO-OP MISSIONS AND RAIDS
Join forces with up to three friends and defeat giant enemy bosses for glory and legendary loot

Fight your rivals in unique multiplayer game modes and diverse PvP arenas

Choose from over 200 unique weapons including Handguns, Assault Rifles, Sub-Machine Guns, Heavy Machine Guns, Shotguns, Sniper Rifles and Rocket Launchers. From plasma beams to good old-fashioned lead bullets.

As your fame grows you will indulge in the wild celebrity lifestyle of the most famous warriors in the Universe and carve your name into mankind’s history.

When you’re not mastering shooting skills you can unwind with your friends in the Shadowgun’s neighbourhood, where you’ll hang out with other players, hit the bar, chat, interact with NPCs and most importantly...party!

You can enjoy all this with MADFINGER Games’ renowned cutting edge visuals, intuitive controls and wicked sense of humor.

At MADFINGER Games we’ve always challenged ourselves to push the boundaries on mobile devices, and we’re proud of our console quality first person shooters.
